name: ImageDecodeOptions
summary: Options for decoding from image sources (non-QR).

methods.name: Screen
methods.summary: Screen preset (budgeted decode for UI capture scenarios).

methods.name: WithMaxDimension
methods.summary: Sets maximum image dimension (pixels) for decoding.

methods.name: WithMaxMilliseconds
methods.summary: Sets the maximum decode time budget (milliseconds).

methods.name: WithBudget
methods.summary: Sets the time+dimension budget in one call.

properties.name: MaxDimension
properties.summary: Maximum image dimension (pixels) for decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled. Set to 0 to disable.

properties.name: MaxMilliseconds
properties.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.
